lines.text: Kung fu THIS, bitch.
This is my dream, and I do what I want.
Might be your dream, but it's my RULES!
No screaming while the bus is in motion.
[Freddy is dressed as The Wicked Witch of the West and is riding a broom]
I'll get you, my pretty! And your little soul, too!
I didn't need a glove to kill your bitch of a mother, and I don't need one now!
All right. Once again. This is your brain.
[Cracks egg]
This is your brain on drugs. Questions?
[Freddy hits him with the frying pan]
Yeah! What are you on? Looks like a frying pan and some eggs to me.
You been a waste since the day I took you in. Now it's time to take your medicine.
[whips Freddy with a belt]

[laughs as the belt strikes him]
Thank you, sir. May I have another?
[his father whips him four more times, but before he can do it the fifth time, Freddy grabs the belt]
You wanna know the secret of pain? If you just stop feeling it, you can start using it.
[holds up a bloody razor blade]
I'm afraid of heights.
Don't be a pussy.
Time to start all over again.
But this isn't Springwood.

[laughs]
Every town has an Elm Street!
[last lines]
Freddy's dead.
Now be a good little doggy and go fetch!

[to Maggie]
Look, do you have any, um... caffeine pills or coffee? Maybe some coke? I meant the soda.
Carlos! I asked you for the map.

[wakes up]
Huh? What? Yeah, well, the map says we're fucked.
Maybe you don't hear so good. Maybe I clean out your ears for you.
[she shows Carlos a giant cotton swab]
No, no. Mama, please, I've been a good boy. You don't understand. I've been good, mama! Please, don't make me deaf, mama! Please! I'm sorry!
[she morphs into Freddy]
I'm not. Ha ha ha!
[Freddy sticks the giant cotton swab into Carlos' ear and it goes through his other ear, Carlos pulls it out]
Oh, Carlos. Lend me your ear.
[Freddy cuts off Carlos' ear]
Hey! You forgot the power glove.
You're getting ready to kill somebody.
*Defend* myself.
It's your mind he'll go for. Your fear.
Daddy's waiting for you, little girl.
Shut the fuck up man!
[kicks Freddy in the balls]

[talking about Spencers dream with Freddy]
I have to go in.
What about Freddy?
Freddy won't hurt me, I'm family.
Ok, so how you gonna go in?

[picks up broken table leg]
You're gonna have to lay me out.

[grabs it]
What? Wha...
C'mon just fucking lay me out!
Wait a second, Doc told me a different way. All you gotta do...
There's no time to talk! Just do it!
[slaps her]
[Tracy immediately belts him and knocks him into a dream]

[after orienting himself]
Jesus Christ.

[five seconds later, Tracy materializes in the dream]
I told you I knew an easier way. Concentration. Meditation. That's what Doc always says.
[John just stares at her]
This place is incredible.
No honey for daddy?
[Morphs into Freddy Krueger]
What's with kids today, huh? No respect.
You can't scare me anymore.
Oh, you better speak up. Must be my deaf ear.
[jingles Carlos' ear]
I know why you let me go.
Ohh. Do you think *I'm* your daddy? Mm-mm! Wrong!
[Freddy begins slicing at John's parachute line]
But you let me live.
Only long enough for to bring me back my daughter.
Your daughter?

[begins slicing away at other parachute line]
And now, she's gonna take me to a whole new playground.
No!

[chops away at last line]
Grounded!
4567 bottles of beer on the wall, 4567 bottles of beer, if one of those bottles should happen to fall, what a case of i...
[is hit with a pillow]
Hell, I'll break a bottle over your head if you don't shut the fuck up!

[glares]
... 4566 bottles of beer on the wall...
[first title card]
"Do you know the terror of he who falls asleep? To the very toes he is terrified, because the ground gives way under him, And the dream begins... " - Friedrich Nietzsche

[looks at a poster]
This is new.

You like it? These are ancient dream demons. Supposedly they roam the dreams of the living till they find the most evil, twisted human imaginable. Then they give him the power to cross the line and turn our nightmares into reality.
Be like me.
[Fells Spencer]
Be like me, be like me.
Father knows best.
[after grabbing the tennis racket and while hitting him with it]
I'm not like you! I don't wanna be like you! Not like you!

[after having finished a game and beaten Spencer]
I beat my high score... Hahahahahahaha!
Sticks and stones may break my bones, but nothing will ever kill me. Well, let's see now. First, they tried burning me.
[slices off thumb]
Then they tried burying me.
[slices off index finger]
But this... this is my favorite.

[gives a finger gesture]
They even tried holy water!

[slices off middle finger, drops hand out of frame and holds it up again with all fingers intact]
But I just keep on tickin'... because they promised me that.
They?
The dream people. The ones that gave me this job. In dreams... I am forever! Too bad you're not.

[looks at a child's drawing]
"K. Krueger." Could mean anything from Kevin to Kyle.
All it really means is there was a child here by that name.
No. It's me. I'm his kid. That's why he's kept me alive. He's trying to play some sick game with me.
*He* is dead, all right. He's dead, and your not his kid.
How do you know?
[points at Orphanage Woman]
She remembered me.
She remembered me, too, and 50 other imaginary friends. Let's get out of here.
Now he's gonna try and trick you just like he tricked Tracy. He'll try and use your eyes to fool you. You'll use these.
[shows her 3D glasses]
Get the hell outta here.
You want to live? These mean nothing here, but in a dream, they can be anything you want. He got inside your head. You get inside of his.
That's my job, isn't it?
Be careful. He's good at finding out what hurts the most.
Exactly.
That's why you gotta take me with you.
I can't. It's gotta be me and him. All right, Doc. Put me in.
They caught one of your star pupils beating up on one of our kids again.
Tracy?
Thought you said you were making progress.
I only get twenty three minutes a week with these kids. With that kind of attention,
[grins]
be lucky she didn't kill him.

[laughs]
That's a good attitude for a therapist!

[Spencer is stoned and falling asleep in front of a broken TV]
Hey Spencer, let's trip out.
[Spencer enters the TV with a psychedelic background]
You're my blood. Only you could've brought me out - in your mind.
Tracey girl, Daddy's home!
Daddy... you're dead.

[playing a video game and watching a character get hit]
Now I'm playing with power!
Not again. He's not gonna get me again. Nothing is gonna make get off this bed.
[bedroom catches fire]
Damn it! I hate this house.
No one remembers John or Carlos. It's like they never existed. I've been hearing strange shit. Like some of the kids are dreaming about Carlos. And they don't even remember him.
I remember him.
Why?
Because I can control my dreams. I'm not fooled by this thing you saw.
Freddy.
Whatever he is, he's fucking with the line between dreams and reality. He didn't just kill Carlos and the others. He erased them.
Freddy, we know what you want.
I want it all!
Of course you do.
Then open up.
And you shall be forever!
Go ahead... put it on. It's in your blood. That's it. Put it on. Feels good, doesn't it? Yeah... come on. Let your daddy show you how to use it.
[Maggie slips on the glove and stabs Freddy in his stomach]
Maggie! Maggie!
[Tracy tosses her a stick of dynamite and Maggie shoves it into Freddy's chest. She kisses Freddy on the cheek]
Happy Father's Day.
[runs out of the room]

[looks at the screen]
Oh... Kids.
[Freddy explodes]

[Springwood, Ohio. Ten years from now]
Mysterious killings and suicides wipe out entire population of children and teenagers. Remaining adults are experiencing mass psychosis.
There is new evidence of one surviving teenager...

[spots Tracy, Spencer and Carlos]
Oh, what beautiful adorable children!
[leans close to Carlos]
Would you like to come live with us? It's been so long since we've had children in the house. So long...

[pinching all their cheeks and hugging them]
This time I swear it'll be different. This time I'll be careful and I'll hide you better so that he'll never find you.
[pretends to pull Tracy's nose off]
Lookie, I got your nose! Lookie!
Ethel!
[pulls her away]
I want my children back!
You know they bring HIM!

[bell at the school starts to sound]
Now see what you done did!
Here's a crucial point! Anybody know what I'm getting at? Anybody? C'mon people! We covered this!
[jabs time line on chalkboard with pointer]
This is where they took away his child!
What child?
Taken away, put in a town orphanage.

[to Maggie]
Freddy had a kid. Freddy had a kid!
[John and Maggie leave quickly]
Freddy came back... to look... for more...
Carlos?
[Spencer crashes through kitchen window, flies across the table then finally ends up on the floor]
I found Spencer!

[while playing a video game]
Hmmm... great graphics.

[Spencer is being violently attacked by Freddy in a dream]
I'll go into his dream, I'll try and bring him out before he gets killed.
That's crazy.
[Spencer suddenly flies to his feet, launches into the ceiling and gets his head stuck]
Well, what do you call that? Rational?
It's travelin' time!
[teleports]

[as they're looking through all the confiscated weapons for the final fight with Freddy, Tracy pulls out a big knife]
Whoa! Look at this knife!
Hey, put that away.
That's too small.
[she pulls out a big club with spikes on the end of it]
Guess so.

[after eating an apple in the dream video game]
Super Spencer!
Spencer, you're such a high-o!
[second title card]
"Welcome to Prime Time, bitch." - Freddy Krueger
One ticket... round trip. Hurry up, boy. You don't wanna miss the bus.

[to John]
This is your wake up call, sunny boy!
Johnny. Up here.

[Rocks imaginary kid on rocking horse]
There you go. Clippety, clop. Clippety, clop. Isn't that fun?

[after absorbing the dead John]
You forgot where you came from, kid... but I know where you're going.
"Population 7742" - it is crossed out and replaced with "7741"]

[while playing the video game and watching a character explode]
Hmm. Great graphics.

[chanting]
son of a hundred maniacs, son of a hundred maniacs, son of a hudnred maniacs...
I can't find Carlos.
You see what's on this TV?
Free me, you idiot! I'm your fucking memory!
